Title: Made in Abyss: Retsujitsu no Ougonkyou
Description: ['Directly after the events of ', Made in Abyss Movie 3: Dawn of the Deep Soul, ', the third installment of ', Made in Abyss, ' covers the adventure of Reg, Riko, and Nanachi in the Sixth Layer, ', The Capital of the Unreturned.]
Related: ['Adaptation: Made in Abyss', 'Prequel: Made in Abyss Movie 3: Fukaki Tamashii no Reimei']
